info.title: SynApps Orchestrator
info.description: Visual AI workflow builder API. Connect specialized AI agent nodes, execute workflows in real-time, and manage LLM provider integrations. Authenticate via JWT bearer tokens or API keys.

post.description: Register a new user account and receive JWT tokens.
Authenticate with email/password and receive JWT tokens.
Rotate a refresh token and receive a new access/refresh pair.

get.description: Return the authenticated user's profile.

post.description: Create an API key for X-API-Key header authentication.

get.description: List active API keys for the authenticated user.
List all registered applets with their metadata (paginated).
List supported LLM providers and model catalogs.
List supported image generation providers and model catalogs.
List all auto-discovered LLM providers with capabilities and status.
Run a health check on a specific discovered provider.

post.description: Dry-run validation of a template/flow definition without execution.

get.description: List all registered webhooks (secrets are not returned).

post.description: Register a new webhook for event delivery.
Create or update a flow with strict validation.

get.description: List all flows with pagination.
Get a flow by ID.
Export a flow as a downloadable JSON file.

post.description: Import a flow from a JSON export. Assigns a new ID to avoid collisions.
RESTful run creation endpoint for a flow.

get.description: List all workflow runs with pagination.
Get a workflow run by ID.
Return normalized full execution trace for a workflow run.
Return structural execution diff between two workflow runs.

post.description: Re-run a previous workflow execution using original or overridden input.

get.description: Service health check — returns status, version, and uptime.
Portfolio dogfood dashboard — template statuses, provider registry, health.
Detailed health check with database, providers, and last template run.
In-memory request metrics: counts, error rate, response time, provider usage.
Unversioned health check endpoint.
Root health check endpoint.

AISuggestRequest.title: AISuggestRequest
AISuggestRequest.description: Strictly validated request body for AI suggestions.

APIKeyCreateRequestStrict.title: APIKeyCreateRequestStrict
APIKeyCreateRequestStrict.description: Strict request model that rejects unknown API-key creation fields.

APIKeyCreateResponseModel.title: APIKeyCreateResponseModel
APIKeyCreateResponseModel.description: Create response that includes the one-time plain API key value.

AuthLoginRequestStrict.title: AuthLoginRequestStrict
AuthLoginRequestStrict.description: Strict request model that rejects unknown login fields.

AuthRefreshRequestStrict.title: AuthRefreshRequestStrict
AuthRefreshRequestStrict.description: Strict request model that rejects unknown refresh-token fields.

AuthRegisterRequestStrict.title: AuthRegisterRequestStrict
AuthRegisterRequestStrict.description: Strict request model that rejects unknown registration fields.

FlowEdgeRequest.title: FlowEdgeRequest
FlowEdgeRequest.description: Strictly validated flow edge for API requests.

FlowNodeRequest.title: FlowNodeRequest
FlowNodeRequest.description: Strictly validated flow node for API requests.

ImportFlowRequest.title: ImportFlowRequest
ImportFlowRequest.description: Request body for importing a flow.

merge_with_original_input.title: Merge With Original Input
merge_with_original_input.description: When true, merge overrides on top of the source run input

RerunFlowRequest.title: RerunFlowRequest
RerunFlowRequest.description: Request body for re-running a previous flow execution with input overrides.

RunFlowRequest.title: RunFlowRequest
RunFlowRequest.description: Strictly validated request body for running a flow.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Registration, login, token refresh, API key management.

tags.name: Flows
tags.description: Create, list, update, delete, import, and export workflows.

tags.name: Runs
tags.description: Execute workflows and inspect run results, traces, and diffs.

tags.name: Providers
tags.description: LLM and image generation provider registries.

tags.name: Dashboard
tags.description: Portfolio health, template status, provider overview.
